Get Involved

Choose your path to participate in Africa Muslim Fest 2026

Forms will be available here soon

Thanks for your interest. In the meantime, choose a path below and we’ll publish the application forms shortly.

  • Partner / Sponsor — financial sponsor, media partner, or strategic partner.
  • Event Partner / Organiser — host an event (multi‑day, single‑day, or micro).
  • Organising Committee — help with programming, logistics, media, partnerships, and more.
